TopicTitle: Quick technical question about damned robotics

Articles.Content:
Have they updated the mumech library and damned robotics yet so you can fast forward without them going all haywire?

Edit:

So my question is not whether DR got updated, but whether this bug still occurs.

Edited June 15, 2013 by Spider0804

Damned Robotics doesn'T have an official patch for KSP 0.20 yet, so I guess not. I heard there's an unnofficial patch going around the DR thread, but I don't know where exactly, you could scroll through the last few pages. It's probably just the old version but working with .20 though.

Damned Robotics doesn'T have an official patch for KSP 0.20 yet, so I guess not. I heard there's an unnofficial patch going around the DR thread, but I don't know where exactly, you could scroll through the last few pages. It's probably just the old version but working with .20 though.

It does have a patch, but the plugin is owned by r4m0n, which didn't answered to any PM's yet about using it.

Yes my main question is about when I played in 0.18 and below using DR the mechanical parts would glitch and be ruined if you went into warp without returning them to their starting position.

The DR creator had stated this was because of the outdated script and he could not do anything until it was updated.

So my question is not whether DR got updated, but whether this bug still occurs.

Yes my main question is about when I played in 0.18 and below using DR the mechanical parts would glitch and be ruined if you went into warp without returning them to their starting position.

The DR creator had stated this was because of the outdated script and he could not do anything until it was updated.

So my question is not whether DR got updated, but whether this bug still occurs.

Well no matter if the bug occurs or not, if the mod hasn't been updated for .20, it won't work on .20, so it doesn't change a thing really :l im not sure if it was fixed, you could check the version log, pretty cure it must be on the DR forum thread or with the download.

I stopped playing in early 0.18 and it could have been updated any time since then.

It does not matter if it is not updated for 0.2 that is not what I am asking.

As mR4Y said you are not giving me useful information in regards to the question.

If you do not know you can just say you do not know, or just not answer with information that does not answer the question, and someone who does know can answer.

Edited June 15, 2013 by Spider0804
